comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of large cruise ship trips and y be the number of small cruise ship trips, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x \leq 7",
        "y \geq 0.4(x+y)",
        "2000x + 800y \geq 20000",
        "x, y \geq 0",
        "x, y are integers"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 20x + 15y"
}
